name: THREE-HEADED SANTA: The Awakening
description:
Gregory has made a fatal error when decorating his Christmas Tree and summons Three-Headed Santa! How will he escape the nightmare?




 Comedy/Horror

🎁 Made in 2 days 🎁
 
💀 WARNING 💀
Moderate Nudity (just some ass cheeks)
Bad Language
Gore


A tribute to bad indie horror games.
